works.description:
Web site articles regarding Health and  
Nutrition.  Our work has been copies and pasted into a spam blog on  
Blogspot, by a spammer who does not write content or ask for permission to
 
copy paste other people's articles.  He also removes any reference to us, 

as if he has written the articles himself.  We believe him to be doing
this  
to others as well.  This person must be stopped.
